mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id as cartId, pd.product_detail_id as productDetailId, pd.product_detail_image as productDetailImage, pd.product_detail_thumbnail as productDetailThumbnail, pd.product_detail_size as productDetailSize, pd.product_detail_color as productDetailColor, pd.product_detail_gender as productDetailGender FROM CART c INNER JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL pd ON c.product_detail_id = pd.product_detail_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
